description: After obtaining a degree in textile technology from the University of Bombay Ashok Raghunath Garde joined ATIRA (Ahmedabad Textile Industry Research Association), where he served for over 3 decades. In 1990 he was appointed CEO of ATIRA. Mr. Garde has been awarded the Fellowship of the Textile Institute, UK, the Honorary Fellowship of the Textile Association, India, and the Fellowship of the Gujarat Science Academy.
name: Ashok R. Garde
